trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around November 30th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taken to some other galaxy in this whirlwind that I was initially afraid of. I then was in this examining room where these embryo like creatures in suits were examining me. i had some ectoplasm thing attached to my mouth and they asked me if I smoked. I said yes, and they made me smoke a cigarrette through this ectoplasm like thing attached to my mouth. They then seemed to concentrate on my right foot. Now, the only thing I have in my right foot is this infection in my great toenail after having slammed my foot in a door quite a few years back, Then I was taken to this open area where there were hundreds of people all walking around. I thought I was dead and it was quite cold and my body felt very heavy. I was also greeted by one of the creatures by a hand signal that i could not imitate. I saw housing installations but they had a sort of flexibility to them that i can not explain. I was again taken back to the exam rom and was given some liquid to drink, but i drank too much and they had to keep me longer for observation because of it. Next thing I know, i am back in bed and I felt as though I had just awoken from anesthesia. My face and body felt all tingly and weird and I couldn't stop touching my face for quite a while afterwards. Dn't know what happened here, but i have seen many things in the sky in Arizona before with missing time and migraines after sightings.
